name: Connor Levesque
text: As always, the food is so good! The faculty was so kind and efficient and made me feel so happy to be ordering pizza there! I am definitely coming back!

text: This place is terrible!!! My pizza was sooooo dry my wings were so hard I could have chipped a tooth!!! I will never go back to this location. Thank God I don't live in Philadelphia! I love Pizza Hut has been my fav since I was a child. â€¦More

text: I am able to give this location 5 stars due to an employee by the name of Yahne`. Yahne` is amazing. She answered the phone with tremendous customer service abilities. She handled the call with such ease and pleasure. She is an ultimate asset to the pizza hut franchise/company location on 40th street.

name: Maria Diaz
text: Hi . I generally love pizza hut . But this one don't ever goto. The employees are rude. They frequently mess up orders and cancel them. I ordered my food at 6:30 in the afternoon. I haven't received it still by 9:30 at night. They had â€¦More

text: There are two Pizza Huts closer then this one. I travel to this one because, its cleaner, better people, excellent pizza.

name: natasha pressley
text: Wish i cld give a neg star!! Called to place my order only to be placed on hold for over 9 mins.. Got to the store only to find 2 customers there while the manager was behind the counter laughing and talking with the 2 customers.. HORRIBLE SERVICE!! and I will never spend my money there

name: Happy Smiles
text: The location itself is cramped, there are always delays with orders, and many times, I'm told that an order hasn't been received at all.

name: Private Name
text: The staff always looks so miserable. They're always understaffed. Some can be unprofessional and the staff they do have is always in rotation. Then when you tell them about themselves they look at u like you're wrong for addressing their issue with working with the public.
